string-array.name: superiorlab_summaries
string-array.item: Warning: Insanely cool stuff ahead!
Some interesting tagline. Blah blah blah...
Get ready to be blown to the world of imagination
Its features lickin\' good
Look out! Behind you!
All things being equal, you are bound to lose.
What I need is a MATURE RELATIONSHIP with a FLOPPY DISK
Never let your schooling interfere with your education
Your life would be very empty if you had nothing to regret
Fame may be fleeting but obscurity is forever
This entry will self-destruct in five minutes
Things are not always what they seem
Some assembly required
He who laughs last didn\'t get the joke
If everything is coming your way then you\'re in the wrong lane
Where there\'s a will, there\'s an Inheritance Tax
This is an unauthorized cybernetic announcement
No stopping or standing
If I am elected, I will hand out free waffles on Tempelhofer Feld!
When all other means of communication fail, try words
Never eat anything bigger than your head
Excessive login or logout messages are a sure sign of senility
Customize till you want it
Think less, customize more
FBI: Feature Base Isolation
This is what awesome looks like
With great features comes great responsibility
Don\'t dream it. Do it
Proudly brought to you without donations
